raw_body: SIRIWARDENE SAVITHRIE (nee ABEYSEKERA) Loving wife of Ranjith de Zoysa Siriwardene,​ mother of Suren & Shanil,​ mother-in-law of Sachini Kamalendran. Remains lie at A.F. Raymond Funeral Parlour on 14th July 2023 from 8 a.m. onwards,​ burial at 4 p.m. at General Cemetery Borella Roman Catholic Section.043117
